transcript:
Executive: Hello, IndiaMART se [inaudible] baat kar raha hu.
Customer: Haan, sir main bol raha hu, mera paisa refund kab tak aayega?
Executive: Sir, aapka company name confirm kar sakte hai?
Customer: [inaudible]
Executive: Ek minute sir, main check kar leta hu. Sir, aapka refund process ho gaya hai, aapko 7 se 10 working days mein aa jayega.
Customer: Kitna din ho gaya process hue?
Executive: Sir, process hue aapko 2 din ho gaya hai.
Customer: Do din ho gaya, kab tak aayega?
Executive: Sir, 7 se 10 working days lagta hai, aapko wait karna padega.
Customer: Theek hai.
Executive: Aur koi help chahiye sir?
Customer: Nahi, theek hai.
Executive: Thank you sir, IndiaMART mein call karne ke liye dhanyavad.
Customer: Dhanyavad.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer wants to know refund status.



Resolution:

- Executive confirmed refund is processed.

- Executive informed it will take 7-10 working days.



Next Steps: 

None

Alert (If Any):

refund

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- refund, status, verification
